ygData.subject: Re: Weapon choices..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hi, Sylly!  Guess what?  I m now 2YKS compliant!  And get this story:  I m invited into the Lord room.  As I arrive I get a tell from a group member Guess
ygData.messageBody:
Sylly Songsynger wrote:
>
> From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>
> Also, you say that procs are not factored in - is that reasonable? I now
> use 2 Yk's and they proc quite nicely thank you <g> 75dd is a nice addition
> to any melee!
>
> Sylly SongSynger
> Bardette of 46 songs
> <The Pantheon>
> somewhere on Innoruuk...

Hi, Sylly! Guess what? I'm now 2YKS compliant! And get this story: I'm
invited into the Lord room. As I arrive I get a tell from a group member
"Guess what we got you yesterday?". Turns out it's a YKS. 10 minutes later
the Lord spawns. I roll a 96. 2 YKS in 10 minutes, kinda cool, huh? hehe

Kenross Cantoforjado, 43 songs, Innuruuk

PS - If it's the King and not the Lord, sue me. What do I care what they're
called if they're dead? As long as they have a YKS on them! ;)
